General_Description: '''Save the Forest''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[merchant]] cutting down trees in a forest guarded by the [[Daughters of Artemis]] brought the fury of the Daughters down on his boat and his head.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
